Articles.Content:
Mods: KIS (Kerbal Inventory System), BDA (BD Armory), FPS (First Person Shooter), Ks (kerbin Side)

All mods available on [Moderator removed defunct website link]

Mission: an enemy force has taken over the KSC. They are holding a public gathering at the Astronaut Complex. your mission is to eliminate the leader and his guards. There will be defenses around the leader in a 1k radius, that can only detect threats outside the KSC, up to 10k. (there is also a tiny defense near the leader, so you have to get in close using a kerbal.

I will post the world later.

Tip: fly in high, then drop paratroopers in with weapons.

Rules: you cannot kill any kerbals that are not your own (if it happens, game over), the leader, and his guards; all of your vehicles need a BD Weapons Manager; none of your craft may be shot down (if yes, then u failed).

Edited August 28, 2022 by James Kerman
link removed
